post.text: La pregunta en esta elección: ¿Quién puede convertir los planes en acción que harán que tu vida sea mejor?

comment.author: Sabrina
comment.text: From what I heard, Is it true Hillary supports late term abortion? If she supports KILLING babies do you really buy that she cares about mothers and familes.

replies.author: Holden
replies.text: Hillary believes that an unborn child has no rights even up to the moment before birth!!! So she thinks it is fine for a baby to be aborted in the birth canal! SICKENING!!!

replies.author: Dalton
replies.text: Alleged Bridgegate mastermind: Gov. Christie laughed about the traffic scheme, Christie denies knowing about the scheme

replies.author: Lucas
replies.text: Miss Universe lies as bad as Hillary does! Tell the whole truth HILLARY! http://www.mediaite.com/tv/no-more-abuse-alicia-machado-speaks-out-to-megyn-kelly-on-trump-insulting-her-weight/

replies.author: Keith
replies.text: Yes molly she does support late term abortions. They're now trying to set it at 36 weeks. A real shame. I agree with yu. How can she say she cares
